oai_dc:dc.dc:title: 1960-06-17 Law Memorandum for the Defendants
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: law; libraries; civil rights; desegregation; Russell, Edward P.; Creson, Larry B.; Montedonico, John S.; 1960s;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The memo explains that "Judge Miller asks that counsel pass to him a week before the hearing a memorandum of points and authorities relied upon."
